title: Payment Request API
summary: The Payment Request API provides a consistent user experience for both merchants and users. It is not a new way for paying for things; rather, it's a way for users to select their preferred way of paying for things, and make that information available to a merchant.
pageTitle: Payment Request API - Web APIs | MDN
